specializations._comment: Fighter Specializations - 16 total (4 paths x 4 nodes each)

fighter_berserker.name: Berserker
fighter_berserker.description: Embrace primal fury and overwhelming offense

fighter_berserker_raging.name: Raging Warrior
fighter_berserker_raging.description: Channel unstoppable rage for maximum damage

fighter_berserker_blood.name: Blood Dancer
fighter_berserker_blood.description: Gain power from blood and pain

fighter_berserker_avatar.name: Avatar of Fury
fighter_berserker_avatar.description: Become the incarnation of pure rage

fighter_guardian.name: Guardian
fighter_guardian.description: Become an unbreakable shield for your allies

fighter_guardian_shield.name: Shield Master
fighter_guardian_shield.description: Master the art of blocking and countering

fighter_guardian_warden.name: Warden
fighter_guardian_warden.description: Reflect damage and endure endless punishment

fighter_tactician.name: Tactician
fighter_tactician.description: Lead your forces with strategic brilliance

fighter_tactician_genius.name: Strategic Genius
fighter_tactician_genius.description: See the battlefield with perfect clarity

fighter_tactician_war.name: War Incarnate
fighter_tactician_war.description: Become the living embodiment of warfare

fighter_assassin.name: Assassin
fighter_assassin.description: Strike from the shadows with lethal precision

fighter_assassin_shadow.name: Shadow Striker
fighter_assassin_shadow.description: Move unseen and strike with devastating force

specializations._comment_gatherer: Gatherer Specializations - 20 total (4 paths x 5 nodes each)

gatherer_miner.name: Miner
gatherer_miner.description: Expert at extracting ore and gems from the earth

gatherer_miner_gem.name: Gem Cutter
gatherer_miner_gem.description: Master the art of gem extraction and cutting

gatherer_miner_deep.name: Deep Miner
gatherer_miner_deep.description: Delve into the deepest veins of precious ore

gatherer_miner_jeweler.name: Master Jeweler
gatherer_miner_jeweler.description: Create legendary gemstones of incomparable value

gatherer_miner_shaper.name: Earth Shaper
gatherer_miner_shaper.description: Command the earth itself to reveal its treasures

gatherer_fisher_pearl.name: Pearl Diver
gatherer_fisher_pearl.description: Dive to impossible depths for precious pearls

gatherer_fisher_whale.name: Whale Hunter
gatherer_fisher_whale.description: Hunt the greatest beasts of the deep

gatherer_fisher_ocean.name: Ocean Master
gatherer_fisher_ocean.description: Command all treasures of the ocean

gatherer_fisher_sovereign.name: Sea Sovereign
gatherer_fisher_sovereign.description: Rule the seas and all creatures within

gatherer_herbalist.name: Herbalist
gatherer_herbalist.description: Gather the finest herbs and plants

gatherer_herbalist_botanist.name: Botanist
gatherer_herbalist_botanist.description: Master all knowledge of plant life

gatherer_herbalist_grove.name: Grove Keeper
gatherer_herbalist_grove.description: Nurture sacred groves of endless bounty

gatherer_herbalist_nature.name: Nature's Chosen
gatherer_herbalist_nature.description: Channel the raw power of nature itself

gatherer_hunter.name: Hunter
gatherer_hunter.description: Track and hunt the most dangerous prey

gatherer_hunter_tracker.name: Tracker
gatherer_hunter_tracker.description: Track any creature across any terrain

gatherer_hunter_trapper.name: Trapper
gatherer_hunter_trapper.description: Set ingenious traps for impossible prey

gatherer_hunter_beast.name: Beast Master
gatherer_hunter_beast.description: Tame the wildest beasts to serve you

gatherer_hunter_apex.name: Apex Predator
gatherer_hunter_apex.description: Stand atop the food chain as the ultimate hunter

specializations._comment_crafter: Crafter Specializations - 16 total (4 paths x 4 nodes each)

crafter_forge_divine.name: Divine Forger
crafter_forge_divine.description: Create divine artifacts of godly power

crafter_alchemist_transmute.name: Transmutation Sage
crafter_alchemist_transmute.description: Master the art of transmutation itself

crafter_enchanter_arcane.name: Arcane Artificer
crafter_enchanter_arcane.description: Master all forms of magical enhancement

crafter_artificer_restorer.name: Relic Restorer
crafter_artificer_restorer.description: Restore ancient relics to their former glory

crafter_artificer_creator.name: Creator's Touch
crafter_artificer_creator.description: Create artifacts rivaling those of the gods

specializations._comment_scholar: Scholar Specializations - 16 total (4 paths x 4 nodes each)

scholar_researcher.name: Researcher
scholar_researcher.description: Unlock the secrets of lost knowledge

scholar_researcher_magic.name: Magic Theorist
scholar_researcher_magic.description: Unravel the mysteries of arcane magic

scholar_researcher_sage.name: Omniscient Sage
scholar_researcher_sage.description: Know all things, from tech to magic

scholar_explorer_cartographer.name: Cartographer
scholar_explorer_cartographer.description: Map the world with perfect precision

scholar_explorer_wanderer.name: World Wanderer
scholar_explorer_wanderer.description: Travel anywhere instantly through mastery of space

scholar_mentor.name: Mentor
scholar_mentor.description: Train others to reach their full potential

scholar_mentor_combat.name: Combat Trainer
scholar_mentor_combat.description: Train warriors to fight with deadly skill

scholar_mentor_skill.name: Skill Instructor
scholar_mentor_skill.description: Teach mastery of all skills and crafts

scholar_mentor_master.name: Grand Master
scholar_mentor_master.description: The ultimate teacher, imparting knowledge effortlessly

scholar_strategist.name: Strategist
scholar_strategist.description: Plan perfect strategies for war and economy

scholar_strategist_genius.name: Tactical Genius
scholar_strategist_genius.description: Perfect strategy in all aspects of rule

specializations._comment_support: Support Specializations - 16 total (4 paths x 4 nodes each)

support_healer_life.name: Life Cleric
support_healer_life.description: Channel pure life energy to restore and cleanse

support_healer_battle.name: Battle Medic
support_healer_battle.description: Heal allies while fighting on the front lines

support_healer_divine.name: Divine Vessel
support_healer_divine.description: Channel divine power to resurrect the fallen

support_buffer_blessing.name: Blessing Priest
support_buffer_blessing.description: Grant divine blessings to entire armies

support_buffer_chanter.name: War Chanter
support_buffer_chanter.description: Sing songs of power that persist through battle

support_protector_shield.name: Shield Bearer
support_protector_shield.description: Grant magical shields to all allies

support_leader.name: Leader
support_leader.description: Boost the efficiency of all nearby gods

support_leader_sovereign.name: Divine Sovereign
support_leader_sovereign.description: Rule with absolute authority and divine right
